activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8016
activity.text: > - [ ] the editor will be used by non-tech savy people, for them, when we click bold, rather than "*" , its better to make the text bold itself > - [ ] when the word is getting bold, keep the related icon, as well as in primary colour to show its active There is a preview section (clicking on it shows how the markdown will appear in the UI). However, if we want a full-fledged live markdown editor, we need to rely on an external package. Achieving this natively would make the code unmaintainable, especially since the [execCommand()](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/execCommand) method, previously used for this, has been deprecated and there is no straightforward alternative. Here is an implementation of a rich text editor using different libraries: https://github.com/UdaySagar-Git/Text-Editor (Lexical is missing). Please let me know if you're okay with adding a package, and I will make a follow-up PR for this. However, I think relying on plain markdown is also a valid approach (this is how WhatsApp handles it, and users are very familiar with that atleast for just bold and italic). - [x] the thread view and default view is the doctor notes dedicated page view is breaking UI - [x] the tooltip of attachment is clipping in the normal full view - [x] when drag select multi line para and try to apply order list, it is being only applied to the first line of the para - [x] add a validation to the hyperlinking related to fields in the pop-up since its accepting empty input

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8016
activity.text:
markdown editor pending 
- preselect/deselect options before we start typing
- after clearing a word the next words to be plain text instead of previous styles

Bugs in functionality
-----
- [ ] when you select a text and apply a preference , then remove a preference, and then again give a preference, the selected text will go out of focus (a video of indicating the issue would be helpful)
- [ x]  when i select a text preference for example Bold, then start typing text, the text preference is not applied to the text (checking this as duplicate- issue 1)
- [ x]  when i apply a text preference for a specific text and after applying, continue typing, the text preference is been applied to the new text as well (thats the expected behaviour - ref : slack editor)
- [ x]  when i apply italics and go to next row of the text, now type to un-select italic, it wont allow  (checking this as duplicate- issue 1)
- [ x]  edit and reply buttons are not visible in mobile view
- [ ]  user tagging will fail if we mention more than 1 character in yours name for example @d if we type it will show the users list but we continue to type @de the list of users wont be visible at all
- [ x]  when we download the uploaded file , formatting is wrong for example in place of audio.mp3 they are saving as audio.mp3.mp3

 
Bug in Design

- [ ] the tagged user text is clickable in a existing note, but when we go and click over it, it's not having any redirection or pop-up or anything relevant ( on last test there was a pop-up showing user name and details currently seem like it is removed) ---yes removed temporaryly to do that from backend
- [x ]  the edit and reply button are only visible when we move the cursor near to the place marked as 2 in the above screenshot
- [ x]  the edit and reply icon is overlapping with notes in mobile view
- [ x]  when we upload a profile image, it is still fully reloading the entire page

makrdown editor (addons to v1) 
- preselect options before we start typing 
- after clearing a word the next words to be plain text instead of previous styles

Mentions
- send a user a notiification that he is tagged (also for reply)
- mention position is not correct when we click on mention button
- filter by name

> ### Action Item of the Week
> * [ ]  Implementing Markdown with full functionality
> * [ ]  Adding support to embed, preview, and copy-paste images
> * [ ]  Implement the tagging mechanism of users
> * [ ]  Implement the preview mode for hyperlinked links
> * [ ]  Introduce the file upload support in the doctor's notes
> * [ ]  Make necessary changes to support bookmark in various categories
> * [ ]  Fully implementing support of file, audio, and camera capture (By July 21st)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8016
activity.text:
- [x]  the cypress is failing, fix it
- [ ]  the warning message for mike looks weirds always present in the UI, it is fine with file upload component, but in this space it doesn't look good, try to think of a better UI to place in her in the chat
- [ ]  i can't remove applied bold or italic or any mark editor to the text, by again clicking on that particular icon
- [ ]  when i apply a mark editor , the text is modified instantly but to see the highlight of any applied mark's i need to click outside the icons.
- [ ]  for hyperlinking, add a pop-up similar to the gmail, where we can see the text we are hyperlinking and the link we want to redirect
- [ ]  the hyperlinked text should be highlight as blue, not as black
- [ ]  i try to hyperlink to google.com, but when i click on the link, i initially redirected to a page not found page, after that i was redirected to google.com, it should ideally redirect to the link
- [ ]  when we click on the hyperlink, always have a browser behavior to open it on a new tab, so the user don't miss the chat
- [ ]  on hovering over the icon, add a tooltip to exact the full name of the icon lets say if user hover over B, the tooltip should say bold, similar for all icons
- [ ]  when i upload a new profile photo, the success notification is shown in the platform, to view the upload new profile, i need to manually reload the page to refresh the state of the page
- [ ]  the icons are clipping in and why are we always showing no replies in text. We could use any icon to represent replies if exist , and no icon if no replies exist
- [ ]  keep the default view as the default, not the thread view

---
Attachments and mentions enhancements are planned after mid term

- [ ]  the attached image or audio files are not been attached to the chat.
- [ ]  you are reusing the voice recording component here, it doesnt go with the UI , think of a better UI
- [ ]  when a invalid file type is upload, the chat space is not restore the state, it is still showing 100% uploaded all the time
- [ ]  rather than showing invalid file type, mention more user friendly error message
- [ ]  try to inspire the tagging mechanism from slack, when we type, the text is visible to the user, and based on each character input, the list keep on filtering
- [ ]  change the cancel text for reply comment to a icon and the send icons giving a feel it doesn't suit there, for example the slack editor looks good for the icon positioning
- [ ]  if a user was tagged in the note, they should be send a notification stating that he/she has been mentioned in this note.
- [ ]  when you click on the tagged user name, you are been taken to a page not found space,

activity.title: ohcnetwork/leaderboard#430
ohcnetwork/leaderboard#430
activity.text:
@rithviknishad , can we have a separate endpoint that is only accessible to the owner? The owner's email will be placed in the env , and the user with that email can access a route where the owner can add users' emails to allow them access to the website. I think we can somehow have write access permissions for the data repository directly using GitHub's new fine-grained PAT and update the data repository using Octokit.
![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/leaderboard/assets/111575806/a952f2be-f24e-486d-95b0-c0c497e3eb2b)
, Also, we can directly update a specific file, such as `allowedUsers`, from the web using Octokit.
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41316067/updating-a-file-in-github-repository-using-octokit

activity.title: ohcnetwork/leaderboard#430
activity.text:
That might be a bit tricky! 

- One thing we can do is domain specific validation (email@organization.com).
- Only the users present in the data repository will be validated or allowed.
- We can add something like a request for access, which creates a PR similar to what we have for updating profiles. If and only if the pr gets merged, then the user will get access.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/leaderboard#430
activity.text:
> How would you validate a user is allowed to access the deployment?

- The feature will be disabled by default, and all routes related to authentication (/api/auth) will redirect to the home page if it's disabled.
- The user needs to manually change a flag like (ENABLE_AUTHENTICATION=true) in the environment variables to enable authentication.
- If a user has enabled this flag, they need to provide a client ID and secret from their own OAuth.
- The user's role will be fetched from the data repo directly based on a username.

activity.text:
> > Hey @Ashesh3 ,
> > Does a file preview for CSV and XLSX files already exist? Or is that open for work? I'm currently working on a similar issue, and I would like to implement a file preview for CSV and XLSX files. I just wanted to confirm before starting the work.
> 
> Currently we do not have file preview for CSV and XLSX, you can work on it if you want but remember that we cannot send our document to a third party service to get the render, i.e Google Doc Embed, Office365 embeds won't work for our case, if you can render csv and xlsx files without iframe'ing these third party sites, then sure, take it up!

I will use the existing packages, read-excel-file and react-csv-reader, for implementation. Is that okay?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#7305
activity.text:
Hey @Ashesh3 ,

Does a file preview for CSV and XLSX files already exist? Or is that open for work? I'm currently working on a similar issue, and I would like to implement a file preview for CSV and XLSX files. I just wanted to confirm before starting the work.

activity.text:
@nihal467 
I think "Dummy Facility 40" is not present causing tests to fail 
![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/111575806/fc6739a1-c762-4142-b23c-d11f53ebca00)
![Screenshot from 2024-02-28 02-35-59](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/111575806/34c26716-d863-458f-9d3c-de7ea7bd2549)

https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/blob/bda15df327003b9bf741edc004fe1eb5d111f463/cypress/e2e/patient_spec/patient_consultation.cy.ts#L22
I ran tests locally by changing "Dummy Facility 40" to "James" and able to pass all the tests 
![Screenshot from 2024-02-28 02-49-02](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/111575806/208745ed-03c7-4286-a467-09a56ea52c5a)
